title: Koogeek - Smart Health
description: Koogeek free app lets you see your weight statsand progress trends in easy-to-understand chartsand graphs on your personalized dashboard whenever and wherever.You can set achievable goals, monitor your progress, and get yourself motivated.About KoogeekKoogeek is committed to make our life become more healthy, comfortable and convenient.Koogeek creates the "Smart Cloud System”, which includes Smart manager, health monitor, Health data analysis, Social Network sharing, customized service, one-click shopping and so on.1. Smart manager: User can add or use various Koogeek's smart devices through the Koogeek "Smart Cloud System", such as body fat monitors, smart bracelets, blood pressure monitors, smart sockets, thermostats, etc. Through the system, Smart manager can organize the devices, and make sure they work perfectly.2. Health Monitor: System can monitor and updates user’s health status by smart devices twenty four 7.3. Health Data Analysis: System can make a health analysis report based on the user's operation, behaviors and health data. Via the report, the system can provide a lot of advises to improve your health, such as healthy tips, exercise adviser, nutrition fact, diet plan and so on.4. Social Network Sharing: To keep you connected, the System allows data sharing between users through Social Network. For example, user can share exercise, health information via social media, like WeChat and microblog.5. Customized Services: Through the health data analysis, the system can provide user the best customized services, like doctors, life assistants, etc., to make life better and less stress.6. One-click Shopping: Through the system, just simply one click, you can purchase your favorite smart hardware or services.If you have any question about our product, please send an email to support@koogeek.com, and you will generally receive a response same business day.Customer Support: http://www.koogeek.com/support.html
descriptionHTML:
Koogeek free app lets you see your weight stats
and progress trends in easy-to-understand charts
and graphs on your personalized
dashboard whenever and wherever.
You can set achievable goals,
monitor your progress, and get yourself motivated.

About Koogeek
Koogeek is committed to make our life become more healthy, comfortable and convenient.
Koogeek creates the "Smart Cloud System”, which includes Smart manager, health monitor, Health data analysis, Social Network sharing, customized service, one-click shopping and so on.

1. Smart manager: User can add or use various Koogeek's smart devices through the Koogeek "Smart Cloud System", such as body fat monitors, smart bracelets, blood pressure monitors, smart sockets, thermostats, etc. Through the system, Smart manager can organize the devices, and make sure they work perfectly.

2. Health Monitor: System can monitor and updates user’s health status by smart devices twenty four 7.

3. Health Data Analysis: System can make a health analysis report based on the user's operation, behaviors and health data. Via the report, the system can provide a lot of advises to improve your health, such as healthy tips, exercise adviser, nutrition fact, diet plan and so on.

4. Social Network Sharing: To keep you connected, the System allows data sharing between users through Social Network. For example, user can share exercise, health information via social media, like WeChat and microblog.

5. Customized Services: Through the health data analysis, the system can provide user the best customized services, like doctors, life assistants, etc., to make life better and less stress.

6. One-click Shopping: Through the system, just simply one click, you can purchase your favorite smart hardware or services.

If you have any question about our product, please send an email to support@koogeek.com, and you will generally receive a response same business day.

Customer Support: http://www.koogeek.com/support.html
comments: Enjoying my scales. App seems limited in what it can do - won't connect with Samsung Health for example but the info it produces is useful and interesting
I spent 1 hour trying to connect a blood pressure monitor. It seems imposible. What a waste of time and money!

I'm actually delighted with my purchase of the arm BP monitor, I assume earlier issues with setting up have been dealt with because it was incredibly simple to do and took a couple of minutes.  My reasons for four stars not five are both app related, it is easy to use but finding out how to export to email for instance is not intuitive, and I'm fairly tech savvy. But good old Google soon provided the solution and once exported it's easy to copy and paste the numbers into a spreadsheet, work out overall averages etc for my GP.   My other small gripe is that I can't add a short note to readings - for example today my BP has changed and it would have been useful to have that recorded in the reading.  Otherwise really pleased and would definitely recommend, I'm now saving up for the scales :)
Bought the bloodpressuremeter because it should connect over wifi (instead of just bluetooth). But this is not working at all, not even with the app opened as mentioned on their website. Too bad.

Just doesn't seem to work. Won't pair with BP monitor. Error messages are nonsensical. Asks for permissions that are completely out of line. Device behavior is erratic. Support website has dead links to support docs. This is one of the worst apps I've ever tried to use.

Utterly horrific setup experience. Installed and created an account expressly to use a new connected blood pressure cuff. The app is filled with typographical errors. The types of permissions necessary to enable the app are intrusive and nonsensical. The device setup workflow doesn't remotely match the written instructions. I still haven't figured it out and I've been designing software interfaces for two decades. It just looks like another app that scrapes personal data, for aggregation and resale, returns no value to me and drains my battery.
recentChanges: 2. Added the BP2-1 (Smart Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor)
3. Optimized the interface and fixed bugs.
